channel.title: anshar on Ian G McDowell's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in anshar on Ian G McDowell's Blog

item.title: Cryptography Primer
item.description: Encryption is a fancy word for a simple concept. You can think of encrypting a message as putting it inside a box with a padlock and locking it. No one can read what’s inside unless they have the same key you used to lock it.

item.title: Ghost Comm
item.description: Talking silently is obviously a huge advantage in combat; it’s one step away from telepathy. It sounds like crazy sci-fi, but most of the pieces already exist today.
